t.t-value: (submenu.is_mega_menu and submenu.is_visible) or submenu.child_id.filtered(lambda menu: menu.is_visible)

a.t-attf-class: #{link_class or ''} #{'active' if submenu.clean_url() and unslug_url(request.httprequest.path) == unslug_url(submenu.clean_url()) else ''}

t.t-value: { 'lang': lang and lang.replace('_', '-'), 'data-website-id': website.id if website else None, 'data-editable': '1' if editable else None, 'data-translatable': '1' if translatable else None, 'data-edit_translations': '1' if edit_translations else None, 'data-view-xmlid': xmlid if editable or translatable else None, 'data-viewid': viewid if editable or translatable else None, 'data-main-object': repr(main_object) if editable or translatable else None, 'data-seo-object': repr(seo_object) if seo_object else None, 'data-oe-company-name': res_company.name, }

t.t-if: not additional_title and main_object and 'name' in main_object
seo_object and 'website_meta_title' in seo_object and seo_object.website_meta_title

meta.t-if: main_object and 'website_indexed' in main_object and not main_object.website_indexed
meta.name: robots

t.t-value: seo_object and 'website_meta_description' in seo_object and seo_object.website_meta_description or website_meta_description or website_meta.get('meta_description', '')
seo_object and 'website_meta_keywords' in seo_object and seo_object.website_meta_keywords or website_meta_keywords

script.t-if: website and website.google_analytics_key and not editable

attribute.name: t-attf-class
attribute.add: #{'o_header_overlay' if 'header_overlay' in main_object and main_object.header_overlay else ''}

div.p: We are a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems.
Our products are designed for small to medium size companies willing to optimize their performance.

a.class: o_cookies_bar_text_policy btn btn-link btn-sm text-nowrap ml-auto
js_close_popup o_cookies_bar_text_button btn btn-primary btn-sm text-nowrap

ul.t-if: (request and request.is_frontend_multilang and len(languages) > 1) or (website and (editable or translatable))

div.t-attf-class: o_record_cover_container d-flex flex-column h-100 #{_cp.get('background_color_class')} #{use_size and _cp.get('resize_class')} #{use_text_align and _cp.get('text_align_class')} #{additionnal_classes}

t.t-raw: website.kanban(model, domain, column, template, step=step, scope=scope, orderby=orderby)

a.t-att-href: '%s,%s-%s' % (obj['kanban_url'], obj['column_id'].id, (obj['page'] < obj['page_end'] and obj['page']+1 or obj['page_end']) )

t.t-value: (next_page and page.url != next_page.url) or not next_page or specific_page

i.t-if: specific_page and prev_page and prev_page.url == page.url and not prev_page.website_id

i.t-attf-title: This page will be published on {{ date_formatted }}
